name: Doc Apocalypse
description: Professor Higgins weather experiment has caused the apocalypse! Help him reach his family and find a way to reverse this mistake which has earned him the name Doc Apocalypse...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card Additional Notes: Mouse, keyboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit OS) Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD CPU Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD ATI video card with 1GB of RAM (Nvidia GeForce GTX 260 or higher/ATI Radeon 4890 or higher) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card Additional Notes: Mouse, keyboard
